t:
My daughter told me that her mirror image was threatening to replace her.



I thought she was imagining things until I saw my right
handed daughter writing
with her left hand.
c:
Although she smiled and said that she was joking, but I can't help the fact that her dimple used to appear on her right cheek.



#daughter #mirror #image #imagination #doppelganger #replace #writing #ambidextrous
